Not a Phase.cite: — Maxine Heron | Online Comms Officer, Not a Phase
Not a Phase.quote: Behind our UK-based charity, we're a small team of 5 people and we're still learning how to get the most out of our Wordpress website. As Online Comms Officer, I reached out to Dana for support on creating a bespoke site feature which we were struggling to find assistance for due to its technicalities. The feature Dana created for us exceeded every expectation and we are thoroughly impressed with her efficiency and knowledge with creating the feature, as well as her patience during the implementation stage which she provided a very helpful demo for. We will absolutely come back to Dana with any future similar site requirements and would highly recommend her to others. Such great work—thank you Dana!

THB.cite: — Matthew Tompkins | Owner & Founder, True History Brewing
THB.quote: I consider myself a pretty articulate person but when it comes to communicating our vision for TrueHistoryBeer.com, we spent years lost in the wilderness. Like many other business owners I'm not very literate about the language of websites and how I want something to look and feel. Dana's superpower is her ability to translate ideas; to hear what I'm saying and tell me what I mean. That seems simple but it unlocked all of our potential and a process that used to give me anxiety suddenly became fun. I've worked with many people and few have made me feel as at ease and confident as Dana.

Queer Walk.cite: — Lauren Hedges | Managing Director, Windsor Hackforge
Queer Walk.quote: Hackforge engaged Dana to lead the development team implementing QueerWalk.ca in spring/summer 2023 and she was an absolute pleasure to work with. In addition to quickly grasping the goals of the project, Dana anticipated obstacles and offered creative solutions to them. She always delivered on-time and to spec, and adapted to changing requirements. When communicating with management, teammates, and the client, Dana was clear and professional and she was able to work through any difficult situations that arose.

MCD.cite: — Michael Cloud Duguay | Musician, composer, and producer
MCD.quote: Working with Dana on developing my website was a notably positive experience. Her aesthetic vision is distinct and focused and she guided me through the technical aspects with transparency and in a collaborative spirit that I really appreciated. Her communication was punctual and respectful and we met all deadlines on time. I will continue to work with Dana for all of my web design needs, and recommend her to any of my peers needing this sort of work. I love the website that she designed for me.

Nina.cite: — Nina Milanovski | Dance artist and producer
Nina.quote: Dana is incredibly reliable, creative, and collaborative. She was able to work with me and my budget to create a stress-free, low-maintenance website that fits my needs perfectly. I can't recommend her enough; her knowledge in accessibility and design sets her apart and makes the entire experience seamless.
